CustomField.description: Calculated Invoice Amount; minimum of $900. Automatically set to 0 if the "Type" is "Labour and Membrane"
CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT( Type__c ) = 'Labor & Membrane', 0, MAX( Case( TEXT(Warranty_Term__c), "10", 900, "15", 1200, "20", 2000, "25", 2500, "30", 3000, 600 ), Square_Footage_of_Installation__c * Case( TEXT(Warranty_Term__c), "10", 0.11, "15", 0.15, "20", 0.20, "25", 0.25, "30", 0.30, 0.06 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated Invoice Amount; minimum of $900. Automatically set to 0 if the "Type" is "Labour and Membrane"
CustomField.label: Invoice Amount
